title: Kaguta
overview: Famed swordsman and poet Cyrano de Bergerac is in love with his cousin Roxane. He has never expressed his love for her as he his large nose undermines his self-confidence. Then he finds a way to express his love to her, indirectly.
watch_on: Bukkedde TV at 3:00pm, NBS TV at 9:00 am, Startimes at Midnight

title: Ekibira ekyaganibwa
overview: Mary Henry ends up the sole survivor of a fatal car accident through mysterious circumstances. Trying to put the incident behind her, she moves to Utah and takes a job as a church organist. But her fresh start is interrupted by visions of a fiendish man. As the visions begin to occur more frequently, Mary finds herself drawn to the deserted carnival on the outskirts of town. The strangely alluring carnival may hold the secret to her tragic past.
watch_on: Bukkedde TV at 11:00pm, NBS TV at 5:00 am, Startimes at noon

title: Ejoogo lya Sitaani
overview: When bookseller Buzz cons Diana into thinking that his friend Stanley knows all there is to know about Africa, they are abducted and ordered to lead Diana and her henchmen to an African tribe in search of a fortune in jewels.
watch_on: NYCE TV at 6:00am, Galaxy TV at 9:00 am, NBS at 1:00am

title: Ejoogo lya Sitaani Part Two
overview: An ex-convict sets out to uncover who framed him for an armored car robbery.
watch_on: STAR TV at 6:00am, UBC TV at 9:00 am, TOP TV at 2:00am
